articles.title: First Human Trial Of Nipah Vaccine Trial Announced - Health Policy Watch
articles.description: The first clinical trial of a vaccine for Nipah, a deadly communicable disease mostly found in South-East Asia, is about to start, the Oxford Vaccine Group
articles.content:
Mature Nipah Virus particles (blue) close to the periphery of an infected VERO cell (purple)
